title: Has VMware Finally Caught Up With Kubernetes?
author: B Cameron Gain
description: VMware Cloud Foundation’s single platform for managing VMs and Kubernetes containers positions VMware to compete with the big three cloud providers.
cntitle: VMware 最终赶上 Kubernetes 了吗？
cndescription: VMware Cloud Foundation 用于管理虚拟机和 Kubernetes 容器的单一平台使 VMware 能够与三大云提供商竞争。
